meanings.definition: A large amount of ships or boats in a harbor.
meanings.sent1: The harborfuls of boats created a beautiful sight on the water.
meanings.sent2: The harborfuls of ships were ready to set sail at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The harborfuls of boats seemed to be having a party in the harbor.
meanings.sent4: The harborfuls of vessels resembled a floating city in the bay.
meanings.sent5: The harborfuls of ships bobbed gently in the calm waters.

meanings.definition: A harbor containing a significant number of vessels.
meanings.sent1: The small harbor was filled with harborfuls of boats.
meanings.sent2: Tourists flocked to see the harborfuls of ships docked in the port.
meanings.sent3: The harborfuls of vessels looked like a crowded parking lot for boats.
meanings.sent4: The harborfuls of ships were like a bustling marketplace on the water.
meanings.sent5: The harborfuls of boats added a vibrant energy to the seaside town.
